Microsoft Copilot Complete Guide 2026

AI Assistant for Microsoft 365

What is Microsoft Copilot?

Microsoft Copilot (formerly Microsoft 365 Copilot) is an AI assistant integrated across Microsoft 365 applications including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Teams. It helps with writing, data analysis, presentation creation, and more.

Key Feature: Deep integration with your Microsoft 365 data and documents for context-aware assistance.
